lines.text: How would you boys like to make $1,000?
Who do you have to murder?
Oh, nothing like that. All you have to do is let me make gentlemen of you.
[the Stooges all flinch in horror]
No, no! Not that!
Our father would never forgive us.
There ain't been a gentleman in our family for fifty generations.
Quit bragging.
You with the mattress head, now, if I gave you a dollar and your father gave you a dollar, how many dollars would you have?
One dollar.
You don't know your arithmetic.
You don't know my father!
But we're organized.
[holds up a card with the letters AAM on it]
The Amalgamated Association of Morons. Local six and seven eighths.
We are morons! Tried and true! We will do our yell for you!
There's evidence of vacancy of the cranium.
There's a hair in my soup.
You're crazy. That's a crack in your plate.
I never saw a crack go that way.
[he makes a curving motion with his hand]
Well, that's neither hair nor there.

[Moe hides a pie he was holding by sticking it to the ceiling]
My dear man. Do tell me about yourself.
Well you see... well that is...
[looks up to see the pie unsticking]
would you pardon me.
If you don't tell me about this metamorphosis. I will always feel that I've missed something.
Lady, if you don't go right now, you're not going to miss anything.
[starts to walk away, Mrs. Smythe-Smythe stops him]
What's wrong? You act as though the Sword of Demacles is hanging over your head.
Lady, you must be psychic.
[walks away]
I wonder what's wrong with that man?
[looks up and the pie unsticks and falls on her face]

[to Professor Quackenbush as they rehearse eating an invisible dinner]
"Pardon me, what are we eating now?"
You disgraceful vagabond!
